thread.title: Fighter: Hrithik Roshan ‘freezes’ in chilly Kashmir, amazed by Deepika Padukone braving cold during ‘Heer Aasmani’ shoot, watch video
thread.title_full: Fighter: Hrithik Roshan ‘freezes’ in chilly Kashmir, amazed by Deepika Padukone braving cold during ‘Heer Aasmani’ shoot, watch video

author: Bollywood Hungama News Network
title: Fighter: Hrithik Roshan ‘freezes’ in chilly Kashmir, amazed by Deepika Padukone braving cold during ‘Heer Aasmani’ shoot, watch video
text:
The recently released 'Heer Aasmani' from Siddharth Anand's Fighter has encapsulated the team spirit, friendship, and love that fuels the Indian Air Force team in their tireless endeavour to defend our airspace. Carrying a sheer spirit of Fighter, the song, starring Hrithik Roshan and Deepika Padukone, has earned praises from the fans who flooded social media by expressing their love. The makers treated the audience with a BTS video to give a glimpse of the shooting experience the team went through in Kashmir.
Fighter: Hrithik Roshan ‘freezes’ in chilly Kashmir, amazed by Deepika Padukone braving cold during ‘Heer Aasmani’ shoot, watch video
'Heer Aasmani' has indeed made its place at the top of the chartbuster songs list. The BTS has been released by the makers and has taken the audience on a tour of what goes on behind the camera. The entire team, including Hrithik, Deepika, Siddharth along with Karan Singh Grover, Akshay Oberoi and Sanjeeda Sheikh, looks immensely energized and totally into the scene. From having fun on the sets to approaching the scene with utmost dedication amid the freezing atmosphere of Kashmir, everyone is putting their best in the song.
Composed by Vishal & Sheykhar, with lyrics penned by Kumaar, and sung by Vishal Dadlani, Sheykhar Ravjiani, and B Praak, 'Heer Aasmani' sets the perfect tone as the anthem song for Fighter!
Directed by Siddharth Anand and presented by Viacom18 Studios in association with Marflix Pictures, Fighter takes flight in theatres on January 25th, 2024.
